TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Unit extends System.ValueType
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Unit extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示长度度量。

span.span: Represents a length measurement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构表示可以用任何与 HTML 兼容的大小单位表示的长度度量。The structure represents a length measurement that can be expressed in any HTML-compatible size unit. 枚举列出可以表示的度量单位。The enumeration lists the units of measurement that can be represented. 由属性（如和）用 `BorderWidth` `Height` 来表示属性的长度或宽度。The is used by properties such as `BorderWidth` and `Height` to represent the length or width of the property. 例如，可以将 Web 服务器控件的属性设置为 表示5个像素的。For example, you can set the property of a Web Server control to a that represents five pixels. > [!NOTE] > 类只能表示-32768 和32767之间的值。The class can represent values only between -32768 and 32767. 使用 属性可确定度量值的长度。Use the property to determine the length of the measurement. 度量单位是使用属性确定的 。The unit of measurement is determined using the property. 您可以 使用 、 、 和 方法将其他数据类型转换为。You can convert other data types to a by using the , , , and methods. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 使用指定的双精度浮点数的结构的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified double precision floating point number. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||由 `value` 指定的值。The value specified by `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果 `value` 不介于-32768 和32767之间，则会引发异常。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

span.span: is not between -32768 and 32767.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 表示 的长度的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the length of the .

summary.span: 用指定的长度初始化 结构的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure with the specified length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 使用指定长度的结构的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the structure using the specified length. 长度在两个部分中指定，长度为值，长度为单位类型。The length is specified in two parts, the length's value and the length's unit type. 例如，"200Cm" 表示长度为200厘米。For example, "200Cm" represents a length of 200 centimeters. 您可以使用任何有效的符合 CSS 的单元表达式。You can use any valid CSS-compliant unit expression. 下表列出了常用的单位类型。The following table lists the common unit types. |单位类型Unit type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Pixel`|长度（以像素为单位）。Length in pixels.| |`Point`|长度（以磅为单位）。Length in points. 一点表示 1/72 英寸。A point represents 1/72 of an inch.| |`Inch`|长度（英寸）。Length in inches.| |`Mm`|长度（以毫米为单位）。Length in millimeters.| |`Cm`|长度（单位为厘米）。Length in centimeters.| |`Percentage`|长度作为父元素的百分比。Length as a percentage of the parent element.| 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||在中指定的单位类型 `value` 。The unit type specified in `value`.| ||中指定的值 `value` 。The value specified in `value`.| > [!CAUTION] > 如果 `value` 不介于-32768 和32767之间，则会引发异常。If `value` is not between -32768 and 32767, an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 指定的长度不在 -32768 和 32767 之间。

span.span: The specified length is not between -32768 and 32767.

exception.span: 不是符合 CSS 的有效单位表达式。

span.span: is not a valid CSS-compliant unit expression.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将 与此方法调用的与指定的对象进行比较 `obj` 。Use the method to compare the that this method is called from with the object specified by `obj`. 对于两个相等的对象，它们必须具有相同的 和 属性值。For both objects to be equal, they must have the same values for both the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 由指定的对象 `obj` 必须是 类型对象，才能成功进行比较。The object specified by `obj` must by a type object for the comparison to succeed. 如果对象为 `null` ， `false` 则返回。If the object is `null`, `false` is returned.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示由 指定的格式的此 。

span.span: A representing this in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回用单元格式的字符串表示形式 ，并使用表示单位的缩写 。The method returns a string representation formatted with a unit and an abbreviation representing the unit . 下表列出了 值及其对应的缩写。The following table lists values and their corresponding abbreviation. |单位类型Unit type|缩写Abbreviation| |---------------|------------------| ||像素px| ||ptpt| ||pcpc| ||inin| ||mmmm| ||cmcm| ||%| ||音em| ||例如ex| 使用 `formatProvider` 可指定用于设置格式的区域性特定信息 。Use `formatProvider` to specify culture-specific information used to format the . 如果 `formatProvider` 为 `null` ，则使用 当前区域性的默认对象集来设置字符串的数字部分的格式。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the numeric portion of the string is formatted using a default object set for the current culture.
